data.name: Super Park VR
data.description:
The game offers 40+ rides and games, including the Drop Tower, Roller-coaster, Slingshot, Loop, Ferris wheel, Techno Jump, Twin Flip, Columbus, Mavric, Pendulum, Hurricane Ride, Bamba Ride, Disko Ride and Space Trainer and so much more. The game will receive more experiences with regular updates.

Each ride offers a unique experience that will keep players on the edge of their seats.
Super Park VR also offers a range of arcade games, including Basket Ball, Dart games, Archery, Shooting games, Bottle shooter, Ring dropMaze, and Go-karting.

The game is perfect for thrill-seekers and amusement park enthusiasts who want to experience the thrills of the rides from the comfort of their own home.

Super Park VR consists of four different roller coaster maps: Dark Dungeon Descent, Wilderness Rush, Frontier Fury, and Doomsday Drop.

Each map offers a unique and thrilling experience for players, with stunning graphics and realistic physics that make players feel like they are actually in the environment.

Super Park VR also offers different roller coaster modes, including target shooting mode, manual drive mode, and auto-pilot mode.

In target shooting mode, players can shoot targets while riding the coaster.
In manual drive mode, players have full control of the coaster and can choose their own speed and direction.

In auto-pilot mode, the coaster is controlled automatically, allowing players to sit back and enjoy the ride without worrying about steering or braking.
